author: CBC News
title: Ukraine cannot negotiate with a gun to its head, Canada's foreign affairs minister says | CBC News
description: Ukraine cannot negotiate a peace agreement with Russia while under intense military threat, Canadian Foreign Affairs Minister Mélanie Joly said in an interview Sunday.
content:
Canadian Foreign Affairs Minister Mélanie Joly says Ukraine cannot negotiate a peace agreement with Russia while under intense military threat.
